channel.title: [pi] Cachedownloader fix
channel.description:
Hello Mopar, I have been trying to fix my cachedownloader and it's failing for about the 17th time :palm:
Here is my client (I have no idea what I am doing wrong):
[b](It's in dutch for those who want to translate it)[/b]

item.title: [pi] Cachedownloader fix
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

That error is already there, its a bit of code that was used to load custom maps. This just says it cannot find the file, and should give you NO issues running the game. If it does though just shoot me a PM and I’ll help you best way I can.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Cachedownloader fix
item.dc:creator: @fic7ion fic7ion
item.description:
@fic7ion wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:2, topic:551809”]I’ll separate this one line for you.

java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\Maurice\WonderCacheV1\WonderCacheV1.zip?dl=0

Now look at the very end. See the “?dl=0” part there? Try removing that. Its looking for “WonderCacheV1.zip?dl=0” and not “WonderCacheV1.zip” like you probably intended. :)[/quote]

Thanks for your reply! It did help me, but bumped me into another error:

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Cachedownloader fix
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

I’ll separate this one line for you.

java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\Maurice\WonderCacheV1\WonderCacheV1.zip?dl=0

Now look at the very end. See the “?dl=0” part there? Try removing that. Its looking for “WonderCacheV1.zip?dl=0” and not “WonderCacheV1.zip” like you probably intended.

Read full topic
